com.Leo.Game

类 GetBlood

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Leo.Game.GetBlood

  • public class GetBlood
extends java.lang.Object
    血包类

    The blood bag will appear randomly on the battlefield. When the hero approaches the blood bag, the hero's health increases.

    从以下版本开始:
    2018.11.20
    版本:
    2.0
    作者:
    鏉庤仾

    • 方法详细资料

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method of drawing a bleeding packet

        Determine whether the generated random number (0-100) is greater than 98. If yes, move the blood packet draw (Graphics) to determine the blood bag survival status. If it does not survive, exit the method. If it survives, draw a blood bag g.drawImage(bloodImags) [0], x, y, null)

        参数:
        g - Brush tool

      • move

        private void move()
        Blood bag moving method

        Determine the upcoming position of the blood bag according to the step value

      • getRect

        public java.awt.Rectangle getRect()
        Rectangular instance
        返回:
        Return a rectangle instance

      • isLive

        public boolean isLive()
        Determine whether it is alive, whether there is a blood bag
        返回:
        Blood bag survival status

      • setLive

        public void setLive(boolean live)
        Set the survival status and set the existence of the blood package
        参数:
        live - Blood bag survival status
